messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3b146fc28ac6 ***

os/user: update stub documentation

R=golang-dev, minux.ma, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6844088

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

The docs comment duplication makes me think if we should add another
level of indirection here.

They have already duplicated 2 times in lookup_{unix,windows}.c

On Mon, Nov 26, 2012 at 10:22 AM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

> The docs comment duplication makes me think if we should add another
> level of indirection here.
>
> They have already duplicated 2 times in lookup_{unix,windows}.c
>

Yeah, let's just make a portable lookup.go with the docs & indirection to
lowercase functions.

LGTM
 On Nov 26, 2012 3:19 PM, <ality@pbrane.org> wrote:

> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, minux.ma@gmail.com,
> bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6844088/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6844088/>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, minux.ma@gmail.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 6844088: os/user: update stub documentation
